mapper.select: WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT TRIM(TXT) AS ID FROM (SELECT distinct regexp_substr(A.TXT, '[^ / ]+', 1, LEVEL) TXT FROM (SELECT #{PLAY_LIST} TXT FROM dual) A CONNECT BY LEVEL <= length(regexp_replace(A.TXT, '[^ / ]+',''))+1) WHERE TXT IS NOT NULL ) SELECT NVL(LISTAGG(A.USER_ID, ', '), '대상자 없음') AS USE_LIST, COUNT(*) AS USE_CNT FROM mt_bella_member A, (select USER_ID, LISTAGG(SUB_ID, ',') AS SUB_ID_LIST FROM ht_bella_member GROUP BY USER_ID) B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID(+) AND A.SUB_GRADE IN('달팽이') AND A.USER_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM TEMP) AND A.USER_ID IN (SELECT TRIM(C.USER_ID) FROM NON_MEMBER C) AND A.USER_ID IN ( SELECT SUB_ID FROM HT_BELLA_MEMBER HT WHERE HT.USER_ID IN(SELECT ID FROM TEMP))

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT TRIM(TXT) AS ID FROM (SELECT distinct regexp_substr(A.TXT, '[^ / ]+', 1, LEVEL) TXT FROM (SELECT #{PLAY_LIST} TXT FROM dual) A CONNECT BY LEVEL <= length(regexp_replace(A.TXT, '[^ / ]+',''))+1) WHERE TXT IS NOT NULL ) SELECT NVL(LISTAGG(A.USER_ID, ', '), '대상자 없음') AS BAN_LIST, COUNT(*) AS BAN_CNT FROM mt_bella_member A, (select USER_ID, LISTAGG(SUB_ID, ',') AS SUB_ID_LIST FROM ht_bella_member GROUP BY USER_ID) B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID(+) AND A.SUB_GRADE IN('카루타') AND A.USER_ID NOT IN(SELECT ID FROM TEMP) AND A.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT TRIM(C.USER_ID) FROM NON_MEMBER C) AND A.USER_ID NOT IN ( SELECT SUB_ID FROM HT_BELLA_MEMBER HT WHERE HT.USER_ID IN(SELECT ID FROM TEMP) UNION ALL SELECT HT.SUB_ID FROM MT_BELLA_MEMBER MT, HT_BELLA_MEMBER HT WHERE MT.USER_ID = HT.USER_ID AND MT.SUB_GRADE IN('검은마법사','하드듄켈','노말루시드') ) AND ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN B.ID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BAN_CNT FROM mt_bella_member A, (SELECT * FROM HT_PLAY WHERE TO_CHAR(PLAY_DT,'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')) B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.ID(+) AND A.USER_ID NOT IN( SELECT SUB_ID FROM HT_BELLA_MEMBER ) ) > 1
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MT_PLAY A USING ( SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-YY') AS PLAY_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HT_PLAY WHERE TO_CHAR(PLAY_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS USE_CNT, #{BAN_CNT} AS BAN_CNT, #{PLAY_LIST} AS PLAY_LIST FROM DUAL ) B ON ( TO_CHAR(A.PLAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-YY') = B.PLAY_DT ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.USE_CNT = B.USE_CNT, A.BAN_CNT = B.BAN_CNT, A.PLAY_LIST = B.PLAY_LIST, A.ALL_CNT = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mt_bella_member) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.PLAY_DT, A.USE_CNT, A.BAN_CNT, A.ALL_CNT, A.PLAY_LIST ) VALUES ( SYSDATE, B.USE_CNT, B.BAN_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mt_bella_member), B.PLAY_LIST )

INSERT INTO HT_PLAY (PLAY_DT, ID) SELECT SYSDATE, TRIM(TXT) FROM ( SELECT distinct regexp_substr(A.TXT, '[^ / ]+', 1, LEVEL) TXT FROM (SELECT #{PLAY_LIST} TXT FROM dual) A CONNECT BY LEVEL <= length(regexp_replace(A.TXT, '[^ / ]+',''))+1 ) WHERE TXT IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(PLAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAY_DT, NVL(USE_CNT, 0) AS USE_CNT, NVL(ALL_CNT, 0) AS ALL_CNT, NVL(PLAY_LIST, ' ') AS PLAY_LIST FROM MT_PLAY ORDER BY PLAY_DT DESC

SELECT SUBSTR(#{PLAY_DT}, 1, 7) AS PLAY_DT, A.USER_ID AS ID, SUM(CASE WHEN B.ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS USE_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN B.ID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BAN_CNT FROM mt_bella_member A, (SELECT * FROM HT_PLAY WHERE TO_CHAR(PLAY_DT,'YYYY-MM') = SUBSTR(#{PLAY_DT}, 1, 7)) B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.ID(+) AND A.USER_ID NOT IN( SELECT SUB_ID FROM HT_BELLA_MEMBER ) GROUP BY A.USER_ID
